modShortDescription: This modlet simply "removes" the tier system from tools, weapons, armor.
modDescription:
This modlet simply “removes” the tier system from tools, weapons, [armor](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-armor-mods/)

in addition to durability  
Durability it’s Durability  
nothing more nothing less

Never see the Stone Axe Q1-Q6 again just just STONE AXE.

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/utd9i4hr7q6lpy5/Tier_System_Removal.zip/file)**
